channel.title: Posts on foxhole
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on foxhole

item.title: Hugo Site CI/CD
item.description:
the goal:

build a hugo site locally, create a github repo to store it, and set up ci/cd so that when I push the repo it automatically publishes to my uberspace asteroid and is accessible from a browser.

despite the numerous guides online, including in uberspace’s wonderful documentation, nothing seemed to work for me correctly.

item.title: welcome
item.description:
welcome

hello and welcome to the foxhole.

this is my personal blog dedicated to showcasing my projects and photographs.

I appreciate you stopping by. If you like it, stop by often.

- fox
